introduction: Overview (3)Born	January 22, 1980 in Long Island, New York, USABirth Name	Christopher Kennedy MastersonHeight	5' 9¼" (1.76 m)Mini Bio (1)Christopher Masterson was born on January 22, 1980 in Long Island, New York, USA as Christopher Kennedy Masterson. He is an actor and producer, known for Malcolm in the Middle (2000), Scary Movie 2 (2001) and My Best Friend's Wedding (1997).Trivia (11)He played the dual role of "Gus" and "Augustus" Coverly in the L.A. Music Center Production of Tom Stoppard's play "Arcadia".Younger brother of Danny Masterson from That '70s Show (1998).Had a small role in the film Beethoven's 2nd (1993). However, his older brother, Danny Masterson, had a leading role in the film. The two were not playing brothers in the movie, so neither one mentioned to anyone that they were related. When producers went to view the film, they noticed the resemblance and reshot all of Chris's scenes with another actor.Lived with his ex-girlfriend Laura Prepon from 2001 until 2008.Older half-brother of Alanna Masterson, Jordan Masterson and Will Masterson.With his brother Danny Masterson and Laura Prepon has invested in "Card Player Magazine".Considered for the role of Will Turner in Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003).His brother, Danny Masterson, and ex-girlfriend, Laura Prepon, both worked in That '70s Show (1998).Played on Celebrity Poker Showdown: Tournament 2, Game 4 (2004) to raise money for Citizens' Commission on Human Rights, an anti-psychiatry advocacy group established in 1969 by the Church of Scientology.Cousin of Angus T. Jones.Brother-in-law of Bijou Phillips.
